Text.val: Send payment initiation messages only after termination statusses have been updated from 974 to 976
Avoiding timing issue between statusses 974 and 976
LET OP! Tabel in Write mode ivm paralelle verwerking!
Set status back from 976 to Nok status of 974 in case of JMS failure

ExpSyntax.val: FlwMtr('Failed to send PaymentInitiation for termination '&Trim(Str({0,1768947717},'15'))&'-'&Trim(Str({0,1768947718},'4'))&', Failed message record id:'&Trim(Str({0,1768947719},'4')),'FALSE'LOG)
